vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.message:
airDrop.transfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(tokenAddress.call(bytes4(keccak256()(transfer(address,uint256))),recipients[i],amount)) (patch_17.sol#11)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in airDrop.transfer (patch_17.sol#4-14):
	-require(bool)(tokenAddress.call(bytes4(keccak256()(transfer(address,uint256))),recipients[i],amount)) patch_17.sol#11

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
